channel.title: Change range Hit?(Rep ++ if you help)
channel.description: Hi in my server range hits insanly high on npcs but not on other people.How do i fix it so range hits less?

item.title: Change range Hit?(Rep ++ if you help)
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

range wont hit high unless u have a decent range bonus for some reason, now that i remembered that i think i may go take a look

 	public void CalculateRange() {
		double MaxHit = 0;
		int RangeBonus = playerBonus[5];
		int Range = playerLevel[playerRanged];
                {
			MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RangeBonus * Range) * 0.00175));
		}
		MaxHit += (double)(Range * 0.1);
		playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit);
	}

Read full topic

if(UseBow){ inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; CheckArrows(); CalculateRange(); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit); }
